BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: KONCIENTIZANDO POR UN MUNDO MEJOR AC

GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS COMPRISED OF SENIOR MANAGING DIRECTORS OR EMPLOYEES OF THE BLACKSTONE GROUP, LP. THE BLACKSTONE GROUP PROVIDES THE FOUNDATION WITH THE USE OF ITS FACILITIES FOR OFFICE SPACE AS WELL AS THE USE OF ITS STAFF FOR ADMINISTRATIVE PURPOSES AT NO CHARGE. ADDITIONALLY, BLACKSTONE ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES PARTNERSHIP LLC ("BASP") (A WHOLLY OWNED ENTITY OF THE BLACKSTONE GROUP, LP) PROVIDES THE FOUNDATION WITH AN INTEREST FREE LOAN FOR OPERATING CAPITAL. THE MATURITY DATE OF THE OUTSTANDING BALANCE UNDER THE LOAN AGREEMENT IS JUNE 30, 2018.
